refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists all the regions that use one of the air codes specified.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Lists all the regions that use one of the air codes specified. The eac command will perform a similar search, but will draw the qualifying regions in the MGED display rather than listing them. Regions that have nonzero ident numbers will not be listed by this command.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the whichair command to list all the regions that use one of the air codes specified.

example.title: List all regions that use the specified air codes.
example.para: Lists all regions in the current database that have air codes of 2 or 3.
